messages.subject: Update about Northeast Unschooling Conference
messages.msgSnippet: Hi folks! I promised that the site for the Northeast Unschooling Conference would be updated and registration would be open on November 1st. We ve had a couple
messages.messageBody:
Hi folks!
I promised that the site for the Northeast Unschooling Conference would be
updated and registration would be open on November 1st. We've had a couple of
complications, so it's going to be a few more days. One of the glitches is
personal -- I'll let people know in a day or two when I know more, and the other
is technical -- the site itself is down temporarily, and will be up soon,
and the server people are working on it.

Please be patient!

Kathryn Baptista



************************************** See what's new at http://www.aol.com


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
